data.name: Today is the best day for you to switch to AnduinOS
data.value: Today is the perfect day for you to switch to AnduinOS

data.name: Reveal the power of your computer, choose AnduinOS
data.value: Unleash the power of your computer, choose AnduinOS

data.name: Transitioning to AnduinOS will be the best decision you've ever made
data.value: Making the switch to AnduinOS will be the best decision you've ever made

data.name: Recommended for users need a stable long-term version and on older hardware.
data.value: Recommended for users who need a stable long-term version and are using older hardware.

data.name: Everything you do on Ubuntu, you can do it on AnduinOS
data.value: Everything you can do on Ubuntu, you can do on AnduinOS

data.name: No telemetry at all! Choose AnduinOS to regain your privacy
data.value: No telemetry whatsoever! Choose AnduinOS to reclaim your privacy

data.name: AnduinOS is Ubuntu's package base + Flatpak app experience
data.value: AnduinOS is Ubuntu's package base + Flatpak app experience

data.name: The AnduinOS server is proudly sponsored by
data.value: The AnduinOS server is proudly sponsored by

data.name: a provider of top-tier hosting services
data.value: a provider of premier hosting services

data.name: AnduinOS is a custom Ubuntu-based Linux distribution that offers a familiar and easy-to-use experience for anyone moving to Linux.
data.value: AnduinOS is a bespoke Ubuntu-based Linux distribution that provides a familiar and straightforward experience for anyone transitioning to Linux.

data.name: Smaller image, friendly interface, unbeatable performance, safe and secure.
data.value: Compact image, user-friendly interface, unbeatable performance, secure and protected.

data.name: The ISO is just 2.0GB in size. Similar to Ubuntu, it is simple to install and can meet your daily needs without additional configuration or complicated operations.
data.value: The ISO is a mere 2.0GB in size. Similar to Ubuntu, it is straightforward to install and can fulfil your daily requirements without additional configuration or complicated operations.

data.name: Privacy is no longer optional. It's essential. AnduinOS is designed to gather nothing from you. We don't track you. We don't profile you. We don't target you. You remain anonymous to the system.
data.value: Privacy is no longer optional. It's essential. AnduinOS is designed to gather nothing from you. We don't track you. We don't profile you. We don't target you. You remain anonymous to the system.

data.name: The GNOME-based desktop environment have beautiful interfaces and human-computer interactions that fit user habits, allowing you to quickly get started with AnduinOS without too much learning cost.
data.value: The GNOME-based desktop environment features beautiful interfaces and intuitive human-computer interactions that align with user habits, enabling you to get started with AnduinOS quickly without a steep learning curve.

data.name: AnduinOS is based on Ubuntu's package base. It's compatible with most of the apt packages from Ubuntu. It's a perfect combination of experience and ecology.
data.value: AnduinOS is built upon Ubuntu's package base. It is compatible with the majority of apt packages from Ubuntu. It's a perfect blend of user experience and ecosystem.

data.name: AnduinOS is an open-source project. Following the GPL-v3 license, you can view the source code, modify it, and redistribute it. It's free and will always be free.
data.value: AnduinOS is an open-source project. Under the GPL-v3 licence, you can view the source code, modify it, and redistribute it. It's free and will always be free.

data.name: Graphical applications are installed via Flatpak, and keep themselves separate from the base system (Since 1.3). They also allow for fine-grained control over their permissions.
data.value: Graphical applications are installed via Flatpak and remain separate from the base system (Since version 1.3). They also allow for fine-grained control over their permissions.

data.name: The LTS version is recommended for users need a stable long-term support, while the Standard version is recommended for users with newer devices and want to explore the latest features.
data.value: The LTS version is recommended for users requiring stable long-term support, whilst the Standard version is recommended for users with newer devices who wish to explore the latest features.

data.name: With AnduinOS, you can do more
data.value: With AnduinOS, you can achieve more

data.name: Everything you do on Ubuntu, you can do it on AnduinOS. You can use it as a daily operating system, a development environment, a server, or a learning tool. It's up to you.
data.value: Anything you can do on Ubuntu, you can do on AnduinOS. You can use it as a daily operating system, a development environment, a server, or a learning tool. It's up to you.

data.name: Here's what some of our 2000+ users have to say about working with AnduinOS.
data.value: Here's what some of our 2000+ users have to say about working with AnduinOS.

data.name: AnduinOS has a clean, beautiful modern design, user-friendly interface, among so many distributions, this is the choice you can't miss. Trust me!!!
data.value: AnduinOS boasts a clean, beautiful, modern design and a user-friendly interface. Among so many distributions, this is the choice you simply cannot miss. Trust me!!!

data.name: AnduinOS has breathed new life into my Surface Go, which I previously thought was useless. Surprisingly, it runs much smoother than Windows. All the features work perfectly!
data.value: AnduinOS has breathed new life into my Surface Go, which I previously thought was useless. Surprisingly, it runs much more smoothly than Windows. All the features work perfectly!

data.name: ...if you're considering taking back your privacy and switching to Linux, Anduin OS is the perfect place to start your journey. It's clean, it's simple, and the transition is seamless. Anduin OS wasn't designed for the tech nerd. It was designed specifically for YOU. Make the switch. You won't regret it.
data.value: ...if you're considering taking back your privacy and switching to Linux, Anduin OS is the perfect place to start your journey. It's clean, it's simple, and the transition is seamless. Anduin OS wasn't designed for the tech nerd. It was designed specifically for YOU. Make the switch. You won't regret it.

data.name: In fact, this is one of those "set-it-and-forget-it" distributions that makes using Linux a delight. It's intuitive, simple to use, and well-designed.
data.value: Indeed, this is one of those "set-it-and-forget-it" distributions that makes using Linux an absolute delight. It's intuitive, straightforward to use, and well-designed.

data.name: The OS continues to focus on ease of use, especially for those users moving over from Windows.
data.value: The OS continues to focus on ease of use, particularly for those users moving over from Windows.

data.name: AnduinOS has profoundly streamlined my life and work processes, solidifying its position as my preferred Linux distribution for everyday use!
data.value: AnduinOS has profoundly streamlined my life and work processes, cementing its position as my preferred Linux distribution for everyday use!

data.name: AnduinOS is your final Linux distribution! It's built for developers and is lightweight yet still powerful. With its well-constructed themes and shortcuts, Windows users can smoothly transition to AnduinOS and forget about setting up your system.
data.value: AnduinOS is your definitive Linux distribution! It's built for developers and is lightweight yet still powerful. With its well-designed themes and shortcuts, Windows users can smoothly transition to AnduinOS and forget about setting up their system.

data.name: ...it's pretty spectacular. It's also quite possibly one of the friendliest Linux distros I've tried when it comes to folks who may well be moving over from Windows. Built by one person, it's pretty astonishing how good it is.
data.value: ...it's absolutely spectacular. It's also quite possibly one of the most user-friendly Linux distros I've tried for those who may be moving over from Windows. Built by one person, it's pretty astonishing how good it is.

data.name: Linux stands as a good option to keep computers running, and if you want something that looks similar to Windows, then AnduinOS is worth checking out.
data.value: Linux stands as a good option to keep computers running, and if you want something that looks similar to Windows, then AnduinOS is worth checking out.

data.name: Is it free to use AnduinOS?
data.value: Is it free to use AnduinOS?

data.name: Here are some of the answers you might be looking for.
data.value: Here are some of the answers you might be looking for.

data.name: What kind of applications can I run on AnduinOS?
data.value: What kind of applications can I run on AnduinOS?

data.name: Yes, AnduinOS is free to use. It is an open-source project that follows the GPL-v3 license. You can view the source code, modify it, and redistribute it. It's free and will always be free.
data.value: Yes, AnduinOS is free to use. It is an open-source project that follows the GPL-v3 licence. You can view the source code, modify it, and redistribute it. It's free and will always be free.

data.name: How can I search for solutions to problems?
data.value: How can I search for solutions to problems?

data.name: AnduinOS is based on Ubuntu's package base. Any software that runs on Ubuntu that can run on AnduinOS. You can run a variety of applications, including but not limited to: Linux apps, web apps, and even Windows apps using Wine.
data.value: AnduinOS is based on Ubuntu's package base. Any software that runs on Ubuntu can run on AnduinOS. You can run a variety of applications, including but not limited to: Linux apps, web apps, and even Windows apps using Wine.

data.name: You have access to AnduinOS online support services via GitHub Discussions. Please contact us at
data.value: You have access to AnduinOS online support services via GitHub Discussions. Please contact us at

data.name: AnduinOS uses Flatpak to manage graphical applications. Flatpak is a software utility for software deployment, application virtualization, and package management. It allows you to run applications in a sandboxed environment, which can help improve security and stability.
data.value: AnduinOS uses Flatpak to manage graphical applications. Flatpak is a software utility for software deployment, application virtualisation, and package management. It allows you to run applications in a sandboxed environment, which can help improve security and stability.

data.name: On Ask Ubuntu, you can search for and ask about very common issues. Solutions for almost all AnduinOS issues are identical to those for Ubuntu. You can rely entirely on Ubuntu's documentation and expertise to resolve problems with AnduinOS.
data.value: On Ask Ubuntu, you can search for and ask about very common issues. Solutions for almost all AnduinOS issues are identical to those for Ubuntu. You can rely entirely on Ubuntu's documentation and expertise to resolve problems with AnduinOS.

data.name: AnduinOS is a non-profit project built in spare time, sustained solely through donations, and is not backed by any corporation or national government.
data.value: AnduinOS is a non-profit project built in spare time, sustained solely through donations, and is not backed by any corporation or national government.

data.name: Please contact us with email at
data.value: Please contact us by email at

data.value: AnduinOS is funded by user donations. We are grateful for your support. And you can

data.value: for any questions. Please join our

data.value: How can I get in touch with the AnduinOS team?

data.value: Join our community and get involved with AnduinOS!

data.name: A Universe of Applications at Your Fingertips.
data.value: A Universe of Applications at Your Fingertips.

data.name: Most of the software you rely on is already here on AnduinOS, alongside thousands of powerful, free, and open-source alternatives. With instant access to the massive libraries of Flatpak and Ubuntu, your perfect workflow is just a click away.
data.value: Most of the software you rely on is already here on AnduinOS, alongside thousands of powerful, free, and open-source alternatives. With instant access to the massive libraries of Flatpak and Ubuntu, your perfect workflow is just a click away.

data.name: Most of the software you rely on runs perfectly on AnduinOS, alongside thousands of powerful, free, and open-source alternatives. AnduinOS provides instant, integrated access to the massive libraries of Flatpak and Ubuntu, making your perfect workflow just a click away.
data.value: Most of the software you rely on runs perfectly on AnduinOS, alongside thousands of powerful, free, and open-source alternatives. AnduinOS provides instant, integrated access to the massive libraries of Flatpak and Ubuntu, making your perfect workflow just a click away.
